title: Rhubarb streusel muffins
ingredients: ['310g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '175g dark brown soft sugar', '125ml vegetable oil', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '225g buttermilk', '185g diced rhubarb', '60g chopped walnuts', '1 tablespoon melted butter', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
